summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Retinal ReSculpt Overnight Cream visibly lifts, firms and re-volumizes facial contours in 4 weeks with encapsulated retinal and NAD+ Lift Complex.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to visibly lift sagging skin and re-volumize facial contours in 4 weeksEncapsulated retinal technology: delivers potent vitamin A (2.5x more*) deeper into skin with minimized irritationNAD+ Lift Complex: inspired by longevity and cellular energy research, ignites skin's natural overnight repair for a youthful, more lifted lookLipid-Rich Complex: floods skin with hydrators that cushion against the potential for dryness, while fueling its nighttime recovery modeWhen you switch off, this overnight cream switches on to visibly improve advanced signs of aging like sagging, crepiness, loss of volume, and deep-set wrinklesFormulated for all skin types and skin tonesContains Vitamin A compounds which contributes to your daily intake of Vitamin A*vs. regular retinal, independent ex-vivo studyResearch ResultsClinically provenOvernight: plumps with intense hydration*In 2 weeks: visibly smooths deep-set wrinkles, including marionette lines and nasolabial folds*In 4 weeks: lifts and firms sagging, crepey skin, including jowl sagging, neck sagging, and horizontal neck lines*In 4 weeks: re-volumizes facial contours and 100% had an increase in skin elasticity**Visible improvements via expert grading or instrumental analysis on 25 participants in a 4-week studyFormulated WithoutAlcohol, animal-derived ingredients, formaldehyde, gluten, mineral oil, oxybenzone, parabens, petrolatum, phthalates, SLS/SLES, sulfates, synthetic colorsItem 2642509How To UseTo Use: PM Massage Retinal ReSculpt Overnight Cream evenly over face and neck. Gentle enough for nightly use. Apply a sunscreen during the day.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Jojoba Esters, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Niacinamide, Maltodextrin, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Phosphate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Hydrolyzed Ulva Lactuca Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Sprout Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Retinal, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Mannitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Aminomethyl Propanol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Carbomer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Chloride, Arachidic Acid, Lauric Acid, Myristic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Linalyl Acetate, Citronellol, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To Use: PM Massage Retinal ReSculpt Overnight Cream evenly over face and neck. Gentle enough for nightly use. Apply a sunscreen during the day.

reviews.headline: Beautiful product and packaging
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Murad had such elegant packaging. Sturdy box, followed by a sleek container. Took me a moment to figure out how the pump worked. Seems like a great design. The cream itself is smooth with a lovely scent. Feels very moisturizing. Hopeful for the results!

reviews.headline: Murad is my new favorite!
reviews.comments: I have recently discovered Murad as a serious game changer when it comes to anti aging products. It seems like this product is professional grade and works better than even higher cost products. I really enjoy this night cream! It hydrate my skin and makes it looks so great every morning.

reviews.headline: Fresh reset
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] After using the Murad Retinal Resculpt Overnight Cream for at least a month, I noticed some improvement in my overall skin texture and hydration. The cream easily absorbs into my skin and blends well with my other skincare products. I love the jar and the push top for dispensing. I should note that this is Step 3 of a facial hydrating system..

reviews.headline: Improved texture
reviews.comments: After using the Murad Retinal Resculpt Overnight Cream for at least a month, I noticed some improvement in my overall skin texture and hydration. The cream easily absorbs into my skin and blends well with my other skincare products. I like the unique packaging so I don't have to dig my fingers inside a jar.

reviews.headline: Murad pm
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product smells amazing for one. A little goes a very long way. The product absorbs nicely and for a retinol product it hasn't dried my skin out or irritated my skin like some products I've had in the past. I've absolutely noticed a difference over a couple weeks of use!

reviews.headline: Works well for redness and uneven texture
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using this product now for about a month on my chest that has a lot of redness. I can say that it has definitely improves the redness and improve the texture. It's very light cream that doesn't leave you sticky. I like to layer it with a thicker cream on top.

reviews.headline: Great!!
reviews.comments:
This brand is incredible, so it's not surprising that this product also does not disappoint! I wish it was a little more affordable, but it is well worth the cost. It feels amazing and the difference is truly noticeable! I definitely plan on making this part of my normal skin care routine. 

I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Not a huge fan
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I didn't really like this product because I feel like I was not the intended audience. I am 25 years old so I think this product would work better on someone that is older. Nevertheless, I did like how the scent was not strong at all.

reviews.headline: Sooo good!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I loveeee this overnight cream! Very moisturizing and creamy! The packaging is sleek and the scent is light! I love going to bed with the feeling I'll wake up in the morning wrinkle free!

reviews.headline: I will buy this again and again!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the Murad Resculpt Overnight Cream! Not only does it feel so luxurious and hydrating on my skin, but it's also made a huge difference in my overall complexion. I've struggled with acne for years, and after using this consistently, I've noticed my skin looks smoother, clearer, and more even. It calms down irritation overnight and helps my skin feel refreshed and healed by morning.

reviews.headline: good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It's a solid product. It's a good little moisturizer. My only gripe is that it's really sticky when I first put it on. I can't say that I've seen any improvement, but it feels nice. I've only been using it for about a week maybe less

reviews.headline: My new favorite pm moisturizer
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
I have been using this Retinal Resculpt Overnight Cream from Murad for the last month, applying every night before bed. I am 38 years young and have been searching for a night cream to combat my fine lines and dry skin. My skin runs on the dry side and has occasional hormonal acne breakouts so I am selective with my skincare products. I have enjoyed using Murad products in the past so I was excited when I saw this. NAD has been such a huge topic lately in the beauty world so the the fact that this has NAD+ Lift complex and encapsulated retinal totally spiked my interest. I am on a journey of learning to love my skin I'm in, freckles and wrinkles and every imperfection. This cream has definitely helped me along on my journey. My skin seems to dry out extra during the summer and winter months. It needs extra TLC to stay moisturized and to keep from looking dehydrated like a lizard. This cream did an amazing job with moisturizing my skin. I loved that it wasn't super heavy or very thick because my skin doesn't do well with those types of creams. Yet, it moisturized my skin extremely well.  I can't say it got rid of my fine lines but it definitely helped reduce the appearance of them. My skin looks healthier and more glowy overall. I can't ask for much more than that in a cream. Also, it did not cause any breakouts or any bad reactions. I truly am impressed with the quality and can't wait to try more products from Murad. I will continue using this nightly and highly recommend to anyone looking for a good night time moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and full of results from this Murad Creme
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I am in love with the results I noticed after trying Murad's Retinal Resculpt Overnight Creme!  It was easy to use and I love the pump dispenser that allows more hygienic use and amount of product that is released.  There is a slight floral scent but it's hardly noticeable.  It's rich and creamy, glides on skin and absorbs quickly.  I have noticed a brightening to my skin and less noticeable fine lines.  It did not irritate my skin, which is a bonus for those with sensitive skin.  Would recommend this!

reviews.headline: Overnight Transformation in a Jar
reviews.comments: This cream delivers visible results quickly. The retinal formula smooths fine lines, firms skin, and improves overall tone while still feeling gentle enough for nightly use. I wake up to skin that looks refreshed, plump, and radiant. The texture is rich yet absorbs well without leaving any residue. Truly an investment-worthy product for anyone serious about anti-aging skincare.

reviews.headline: Enjoyed this night cream!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Goes on smooth and feels very moisturizing! I didn't experience any dryness which was nice! At times it may have felt a little bit Sticky but nothing too bad. I loved the dispenser!!! I don't feel I had earth shattering results but did feel like it smoothed my skin. I liked it!

reviews.headline: Great overnight cream
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product is really great. It does not have a funky scent and it leaves my skin feeling great. At first I can seem a little thick, but once it soaks in it is great.

reviews.headline: Really works!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product works! I've been using it 3x a week because my skin can be sensitive to retinol products but I've still seen results.

reviews.headline: lovely skincare
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love this cream from Murad. The packaging is perfect and love the despensing of the product. Clean and effective product that has made my skin look better.

reviews.headline: Would buy
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this overnight cream! I feel like it makes my face look much more brighter and rejuvenated after using it. A little dollop does go a long way

reviews.headline: Non-irritating night cream
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I found this Murad Retinal Rescue Overnight cream to be non-irritating on my moderately sensitive skin. I have been using this product for about 4 weeks and have noticed subtle results so far. My skin does feel more hydrated and some improvement in elasticity and in my fine lines. It is very lightly scented. Overall, I will continue to use to see greater results.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
I have been using this Retinal Resculpt Overnight Cream from Murad for the last month, applying every night before bed. I am 38 years young and have been searching for a night cream to combat my fine lines and dry skin. My skin runs on the dry side and has occasional hormonal acne breakouts so I am selective with my skincare products. I have enjoyed using Murad products in the past so I was excited when I saw this. NAD has been such a huge topic lately in the beauty world so the the fact that this has NAD+ Lift complex and encapsulated retinal totally spiked my interest. I am on a journey of learning to love my skin I'm in, freckles and wrinkles and every imperfection. This cream has definitely helped me along on my journey. My skin seems to dry out extra during the summer and winter months. It needs extra TLC to stay moisturized and to keep from looking dehydrated like a lizard. This cream did an amazing job with moisturizing my skin. I loved that it wasn't super heavy or very thick because my skin doesn't do well with those types of creams. Yet, it moisturized my skin extremely well.  I can't say it got rid of my fine lines but it definitely helped reduce the appearance of them. My skin looks healthier and more glowy overall. I can't ask for much more than that in a cream. Also, it did not cause any breakouts or any bad reactions. I truly am impressed with the quality and can't wait to try more products from Murad. I will continue using this nightly and highly recommend to anyone looking for a good night time moisturizer.
faceoff_positive.headline: My new favorite pm moisturizer

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I swapped this into my nighttime skincare routine for 2.5 weeks, and I'm not impressed  I really wanted this to work, I use retinol almost daily and combining my serum and cream into one step would've been awesome! The airless pump is also a great touch. The first pic with pink background is before and then second is after. This broke me out noticeably  I'm fairly certain it's the fragrance, there are 3 fragrance ingredients at the very end of the formula so I thought I'd get away with it but nope. This is a much lower strength retinol than my usual product so definitely not a "purge", my skin was irritated. The scent is rather strong and lingers quite a while, it's a hard to describe scent. Not floral, almost a bitter soapy smell? With this price point I'm very disappointed in the formulation. I'll be using as a hand cream or maybe on my decolletage, I'll have to test and see if my skin is less reactive there.
faceoff_negative.headline: Big letdown
